title: GO2COD – Co-founder & COO
description: Co-founded and lead a nonprofit platform offering free internships in web development, UI/UX, and Python.
Built and maintained the GO2COD website with responsive design and optimized UX.
Mentor interns in web technologies and design best practices.
Helped over 250 interns gain real-world experience through structured mentorship.

title: A2SV – Data Structures & Algorithms Trainee
description: Undergoing intensive training in data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving using JavaScript.
Participate in mock interviews to improve coding interview skills.
Solve algorithmic challenges in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.

title: Freelance Web Developer & UI/UX Designer
description: Design and develop responsive websites tailored to client needs using JavaScript and Tailwind CSS.
Create intuitive UI/UX designs using Figma for various platforms.
Improve site performance and usability through modern development practices.
